parameters: Welcome to the Transcendant Memories Battle Test Demo. \.
This demo is designed for you to get a feel for the
characters and to learn about the battle system of TM.
Press "Z" or "Enter" to talk to someone,\.
And walk up to that enemy in the center when you want
The enemy will be randomized into 1 of 6 different
troops of enemies for you to fight, enjoy!
Would you like to chang your path of Sin?
You know how special abilities work right?
Each character has their own version of a basic attack
and a special ability that is specific to that
Drix learn spells according to their hp. \.
Phixies gain an atk and def boost \.
Vampires gain immortailty for some time \.
and Wolves either buff or counter depending on state.
After using a special ability, a character cannot use
that ability again until the end of a 3 turn cooldown.
Well, come talk to me if you ever need a reminder.
Do you want me to heal you?
You don't need any more blood.
All damaging skills run on a DS scale from 1-5.
1 being the lowest amount of damage and 5 being the
Well, come talk to me if you ever need a reminder.
Do you want me to heal you?
Do you need some mana shards?
You do remember how FT works ow don't you.
As you know, fatigue or FT is different from mp
and tp, yet very simmilar at the same time.
Moves either add to your FT meter or subtract from it.
Unlike tp though, fatigue is charged or subtracted
whether or not you land a hit. \.
So be careful when using lower accuracy moves.
Also, your charging moves usually are instant while
your FT meter is below a certain point. \. That way you
can combo your moves while your FT meter is low.\|
Remember, enemies can do the same as well.
Good, I'll be here if you need a refresher.
Do you want me to heal you?
Ferna recieved 200 pieces of Snakeroot, Daffodils,
Do you want me to heal you?
You already know how the skill learn system
You learn new skills just by using the ones you have.\.
There are set numbers right now for this "demo" but in
the future, it will depend on the skill itself.
Moves that give FT will learn an upgraded version after
10 uses. Moves that cost FT at 5 uses, and
Moves that don't use FT at 3 uses.
Well, come talk to me if you ever need a reminder.
